meanings.definition: To drink more alcohol than someone else.
meanings.sent1: Last night, Sarah was outdrinking her friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outdrink everyone at the bar.
meanings.sent3: The competition was fierce, but Sarah was determined to outdrink them all.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of outdrinking, he emerged as the champion.
meanings.sent5: The challenge was to outdrink the unbeatable champion, but Sarah was up for it.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming more alcohol than others in a social setting.
meanings.sent1: Outdrinking can sometimes lead to embarrassing situations.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her outdrinking skills at social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The outdrinking contest at the party was the highlight of the night.
meanings.sent4: His outdrinking prowess earned him the title of party king.
meanings.sent5: The art of outdrinking requires both skill and determination.
